scripts.build: elm make src/Main.elm --output=public/app.temp.js --optimize && uglifyjs public/app.temp.js --compress 'pure_funcs=[F2,F3,F4,F5,F6,F7,F8,F9,A2,A3,A4,A5,A6,A7,A8,A9],pure_getters,keep_fargs=false,unsafe_comps,unsafe' | uglifyjs --mangle --output public/app.js && rm public/app.temp.js
scripts.launch: scp public/app.js eventstore:/var/www/html/timeblock && scp public/index.html eventstore:/var/www/html/timeblock
